attributes.additional_details: Social media poses serious risks to under-16s' mental health, exposing them to harmful content, cyberbullying, and unrealistic online personas. Developing brains are vulnerable, impacting social and emotional growth. A ban, while complex, highlights the urgent need to protect young people online, aligning with the UK's Online Safety Act goals.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Introduce 16 as the minimum age for children to have social media
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700086
